verses.name: Leviticus 3:5
verses.text: And Aaron’s sons shall burn it on the altar upon the burnt sacrifice, which is upon the wood that is on the fire: it is an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 3:6
verses.text: And if his offering for a sacrifice of peace offering unto the Lord be of the flock; male or female, he shall offer it without blemish.

verses.name: Leviticus 3:7
verses.text: If he offer a lamb for his offering, then shall he offer it before the Lord.
